website_summaries.verdict: With excellent performance, the OCZ Vertex 3 SSD makes an ideal internal storage drive for laptops and desktop computers, especially those that support the 6Gbps SATA standard. Its hefty price tag will make most consumers think twice, however.
pros: The OCZ Vertex 3 solid-state drive supports SATA 6Gbps and offers very fast performance and up to 480GB of storage
The 2.5-inch internal drive comes with a mounting accessory to fit in desktop computers' drive bays, and is comparatively affordable
cons: The OCZ Vertex 3 SSD is significantly more expensive than traditional hard drives, particularly the 480GB-capacity model, and takes a long time to format

customer_reviews.title: You like Faster, the futher is Now!
customer_reviews.text: Finely, enough money to buy the Ocz 120GB, Watch-out George Orwell! Was I Worried about Amazon? No. Installed the SSD, the Vertex 3 SATA 6GB/S won't run at 6GBs. the X58 not designed, and drivers to run at 6GBs not made for the "Sabertoothed" mobo. and Marvell wasn't helping. But at that time the motherboard had what was needed (Generalizing) but no matter the SSD allows it to boot a lot quicker and it does what it meant too.(Minimizing) I'm not built for the "Future"
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Pallares

customer_reviews.title: 9 months and no problems - it works
customer_reviews.text: I installed this drive in my Compaq Presario CQ56 laptop in November 2011. I cloned the original drive to this one and swapped them. It has performed beautifully. No conflicts of any sort, and no crashes. The computer boots up and shuts down almost instantly, to say nothing of how quickly the programs start. I'm not a gamer, and don't drive my laptop very hard. I use it mainly for photo editing, and light duty activities like writing, bill paying, shopping, and general surfing. I'm waiting in anxious anticipation for the higher capacity SSDs to come down in price so I can replace the boot drive of my desktop that contains several space hungry audio, video and photo editing programs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Fast SSD....... what else?
customer_reviews.text: This is a plug and play SSD. it is not as fast as the RevoDrive I did in my last computer, but I have had zero problems with either on in my new computer. I am selfish so all of my games go on one and windows goes on the other. This system works great so far and the price per Gb is good. They could have gotten a slightly better rating, if the mounting brackets had a few more holes in them allowing more mounting choices, but meh, whatever. I would have liked them to be mounted so they can be seen in my case, not so the the brackets can be seen. Good SSD though.
customer_reviews.author: Chev

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product Very Bad customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I had the unfortunate luck to purchase this SSD, with few installation glitches and some back compatibility with older SATA, the SSD just keeps crashing. the max speed advertised is much higher than the current speed, so beware. Contacts to customer service stay in hold for 40min... also, I have to point out the likelihood of never getting a rebate, I purchased the product when it had a 30$ rebate and never received it! Overall I will stay with Samsung SSD, much reliable and better customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Arsene Lupin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have upgraded 5 macbooks at my office now with this model drive, from an original 2008 macbook up to mid-2010. I flashed them all to the latest firmware (2.11 as of this writing) before doing a clean install of Lion. So far, it has been amazing. Speed is right in line with what you'd expect given that none of these macs have 6Gbps SATA. Reliability is 100%. The creaky old 2008 machines now run rings around the newer ones that still have mechanical drives. I would unhesitatingly recommend this drive to anyone who needs a new SSD.
customer_reviews.author: J. Drukman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried about the reviews of these being unreliable. Plugged it in, worked great out of the box. Use this for my OS and Gaming drive. Everything else goes to my Raid drives. Windows 7 boots up within seconds. What takes the longest is my computer POSTing. Maybe one day when I have money to burn, I'll buy another one of these skinny suckers and put it in Raid 0 with this one. Just so they can point and laugh at my overweight power hungry SATA drives.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Super fast
customer_reviews.text: I did have problems with it not recognizing itself as a SSD when defragmenting so when it defragged when it thought it was a HDD it messed it up and i had to reconfigure the drive took a shadow copy of it in HDD form and converted it back to SSD so luckily i didn't lose anything it was just a hiccup in the system. Been working for this past year and its super fast, i use it for my boot records fastest boot time ive had was 5 seconds. but you need the motherboard, ram, and cpu performance to even reach that.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: very reliable after years
customer_reviews.text: I have this disk in my home pc and is very reliable. my vertex2 needs to be changed every year (fails) but this vertex3 is totally different. I hope vertex4 have the same built quality (I hate my vertex2) but I love my vertex3. My pc is pretty fast with windows 8.1 and this disk (core i7, 8gb ram, dual screen). I can restart in less than 10 seconds and get full desktop.. is amazing! I will never use an regular HDD for OS again in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: SSD are great
customer_reviews.text: This was the first SSD I purchased. I wasn't quite sure if it was worth the cost but if you game at all, I would absolutely recommend. This one is really fast(I don't have a lot to compare against) and I have had no issues with file corruption. The only downside, it wasn't big enough. 120gig went fast especially with games, so I had to purchase another one. Now, this one stores my OS and I use the other one to store my game files.
customer_reviews.author: J. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Incredible system boost
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at amount of speed this drive gives to system performance. Windows boot up in under 10 seconds. Full virus scan with Avast! of 60GB take about 2 minutes. Windows Experience score is 7.9 max available on Windows 7. Cut and pasted a game folder from desktop to C:\ drive, 10GB takes 2 seconds to move. Already had a high end system, was just the hard drive that was slowing it down. Great purchase for any enthusiast PC builder. Note: Be sure to load the latest firmware on your drive prior to installing Windows. Several reports of BSOD errors, I haven't experienced any of those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soooo fast!
customer_reviews.text: This drive is so fast it will blow your socks off... Not very big so you will need a secondary drive for storage, but using this drive for a boot drive cut my boot up time down to 20 seconds from over a minute! I've had this drive in a PC that I built for over a month now with no problems at all. I highly recommend this to people looking to speed up their pc, be aware though that if you install this in an existing PC you will have to either copy your OS over to this drive from the one it was on or re-install it to get the fast boot up times.
customer_reviews.author: Minotaur

customer_reviews.title: Failed.
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews and heard of problems with these drives, but bought one anyway, hoping to avoid them. I didn't. After about 30 days, the drive stopped responding. Luckily, I just had my OS/programs installed on it, so no valuable data was lost. I replaced it with an Intel drive, and after a year things are just dandy. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing SSD
customer_reviews.text: Great fast drive, put this on a new Sandy Bridge system with Win 7 64bit, and am very happy with the performance. Programs start fast and everything happens almost instantly. I use the sleep a lot and it sleeps and wakes almost immediately. Doesn't start quite as fast as I thought, but think that's mainly because my bios takes longer to boot. But so far this drive is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dhyard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speed.
customer_reviews.text: I used EaseUs todo-backup to transfer my old drives data to this one. I haven't looked back since. went from 5 minute boots to less than a minute. outlook and other database apps load in almost no time (3minutes to 10 seconds). Not having to worry about bumping the computer has made it much more mobile for me. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: UltimApe

customer_reviews.title: Works well except for newer computer
customer_reviews.text: This product works well with my Core2 Duo laptop but when i upgrade to i7 it hangs a lot. Particularly on the data transfer and it will just freeze. Upgraded the firmware and it works better. No choice but had to reformat again. So far it has been good after that and crossed my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: VIVAVAIO

customer_reviews.title: Bought this years ago and have since upgraded to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this years ago and have since upgraded to a 1TB SSD. I have given this one to my son and he's still using it.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic SSD !!
customer_reviews.text: With a Boot Time of 7 Seconds on My Windows 7, i7 2600k System, I am all praise for this Wonderful SSD, My COD4 Loads in a Second ( A Matter of Pride in Lan Tournaments ) System Works Like a Charm, All The Apps open at lightning Speed. Great SSD, Recommended For all Budget SSD Buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Mukul Sabhani

customer_reviews.title: Still working years later
customer_reviews.text: A few years later this thing is still rocking with great speeds in my 5 year old laptop. That first gen i7 with this SSD make new computers on a HDD look terribly slow in comparison. I have 7 SSD's 6 of which are OCZ and are all 2 or more years old and are still performing good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Been using this SSD for a few years now as the primary hard drive disk in my Mac Pro tower. Has worked very well, very fast, real reliable, etc. I think it was a great choice to have a SSD be the main drive and a high capacity SATA be the secondary for file storage.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing SSD
customer_reviews.text: Bought together with the : Core i7-2600K Quad-Core Processor 3.4 Ghz 8 MB Cache LGA 1155 Corsair Vengeance Blue 16 GB DDR3 SDRAM Dual Channel MSI GTX560 Twin Frozr II My rig is just excellent for gaming and no Blue screens so far. Using the windows 8 pro at the moment. Windows experience rated from 6,5 to 7,7. Buy it or die!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD
customer_reviews.text: Its a great SSD, very fast, you want to have native SATA3 support (H67/P67) on your Mobo or a good PCIe SATA3 add-in card otherwise you won't be able to realize the maximum performance of this drive. That said, its much faster than my Vertex 2 on my P55 system. The only negative is that its not as fast as the 240GB Vertex3, but, I'm poor so, I'll take the best performing SSD for the money.
customer_reviews.author: NoSalesTax

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This SSD is fast, easy to use, supports TRIM tech for long term stability, and has performed phenomenally well for the year I've had it install as my boot drive. Post to login times went instantly from 35-40 seconds to less than 20. I will buy the next gen of the OCZ SSDs for my next build.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: No debate any longer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in a desktop PC, and we've had zero issues with it. It shipped with the latest firmware and I've had zero cut outs or any issues as described by some of the reviewers. I've had nothing but perfect fast performance from this unit. Fully recommended.
customer_reviews.author: THATCHMAN1

customer_reviews.title: even the not so current ssd beats my old Seagate hands down
customer_reviews.text: these things are small, quick, and soundless. I started with 40 mb MFM drives and those old anchors, full height ESDI drives, both of which clicked and rumbled when started. no moving parts and relatively blazing speeds are a real eyeopener. bless progress.
customer_reviews.author: Hon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good budget SSD
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with my Blackmagic Cinema Camera. I have never been disappointed with this SSD, although I does get a little hotter than some of my other brands I have.
customer_reviews.author: levi woods

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have owned two of these SSDs for several years. Both perform great and have been very reliable. OCZ products and customer support are always great. Hopefully I never need their customer support but it's nice knowing they're there.
customer_reviews.author: Gigabyte

customer_reviews.title: Lot of problems with firmware OCZ drives, BSODs all ...
customer_reviews.text: Lot of problems with firmware OCZ drives, BSODs all the time,, till it died after 2month. Never again OCZ ssd drive !
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Fastest SSD
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a quality SSD for my custom build and this is one that I saw was one of the fastest available. I got it and so far its lighting fast and I love how SSD are completely silent. Get this for performance!
customer_reviews.author: M. Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Flawless with firmware 2.15
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drive about a month ago. Upgraded the firmware before I installed it in my laptop and it has works perfectly from day one. Whatever issues the drive had in the past, they seem to be resolved with the latest firmware release.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: Spent more time waiting for replacements then actually using them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and put them in raid 0. I RMA'd one twice and the other 3 times. I could not get a single one to last more then 6 months on any of the 5 SSD's I had from OCZ, Never buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Nice new SSD
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Relatively inexpensive. Tested good. No complaints. Good distribution of quality retail goods - not one of those places that makes use of the very small window for failure.
customer_reviews.author: Bit Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: My system loads in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago and updated the firmware before loading it with my new copy of Win7. Have had zero troubles with it and it can go from completely off to back in working order in mere seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: FAST
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is Speed, Performance, Quality and Warranty. This is one of the fastest SSD on the market today. Coming from OCZ you can trust that you're buying a quality product with an excellent warranty and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vertex 3.60gb sata3
customer_reviews.text: Drive is super fast with a fresh install of windows 7 x64, asus p6x58d premium and 6gb's of ddr3. 15-20 minute windows install. Start up and shutdown 30 seconds max after installing windows updates and other software. No problems yet, will update if I come across any.. Oh and the 3.5" adapter is a little tricky to mount and line up.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Fast and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This drive was purchased as a part of a hackintosh desktop build- the drive is working just as fast as when I bought it, and I am looking forward to more fast and reliable use.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: One of the fastest drives available!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was hands down, the single most effective upgrade to my computer's performance since I built it a couple years ago. I have an i7 980x 6 core with 6 more virtual cores, a GTX 980x graphics card, and 12 gigs of triple channel OCZ gold memory running and insist on overclocking the entire rig routinely, but nothing has increased responsiveness like adding this Solid State Drive by OCZ. Way to go! Also, this drive is not the most expensive one out there and has some of the best benchmarks for any drive within like another $100 dollars of it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: OCZ 120GB Vertex 3 SATA 6Gb/s
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a while. Then, It proved to be too small for my needs. I then installed it in my galfriend's PC. It is serving her well.
customer_reviews.author: OC nubi

customer_reviews.title: good product~
customer_reviews.text: My PC was very fast. 10 seconds boot speed. Program execution may not exceed one second. Very satisfied. PC was super. I hope that the price down a little bit more. But I'm satisfied. There is no downside.
customer_reviews.author: Wooyoung

customer_reviews.title: Awesome SSD
customer_reviews.text: Just installed a clean copy of Windows 7 on my new drive. My computer boots up in about 30 seconds. Programs launch almost instantly. Shutting down takes 5 seconds. A solid upgrade to any computer.
customer_reviews.author: thauenstein

customer_reviews.title: Storage and speed, yes!
customer_reviews.text: Put this into a macbook pro and I love the speed it gives me. Cheap and easy way to upgrade the pro.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Fast Fast Fast
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the performance of this SSD hard drive. Comes with a 2.5" to 3"5 drive adapter/screws. Installed into a computer with Gigabyte P55 Chipset board, 16GB RAM, Windows 7 64bit (15min install time). Boots up in 30 secs. Loads Photoshop CS5 64bit in less than 10 secs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Vertex 3 FAST!!!
customer_reviews.text: This drive is blazing fast, and I only have it hooked up to a 3Gb/s port. Windows Server 2008 RC2 installs quick (10mins maybe) and runs fast on the server. I went and bought another one too replace my 2 raptor drives in raid 0 in my desktop, still waiting on it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James N. White

customer_reviews.title: This is the Sole reason that I still have the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the Sole reason that I still have the same laptop 4 years later. Really changed it completely and made everything lightning fast.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Going strong after 8 years..... no problems
customer_reviews.text: Initial problems were due to a bad PSU cable solder joint in side PSU. Was not an issue with sandforce chipset as many had suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Moore

customer_reviews.title: super fast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely amazing. Worth every penny. Just make sure you update to firmware version 2.15 and you're good to go. Windows boots up in seconds, shuts down instantly. Hands down the best upgrade you can do for your computer. I even bought a second and put it in my 2007 MacBook Pro, and it is now overall a much faster computer than my roommate's 2011 MBP. Ha! If you are on the fence, jump on over to the SSD side, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: nickolas837

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: WIndows 7 loads so fast with this little drive! I've been completely satisfied with this hard drive. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Conner

customer_reviews.title: Fast, and got it on sale at the time
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for about a year or more now. I've had no problems, the only thing is I wish it was larger storage wise, lol. The joy of not having to wait to boot up, games to load, and lower power draw and no noise compared to a HDD is wonderful. I just hope they get better, store more and drop in price again for the newer generations.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: insalled windows 7 on this ..fresh install went smoothly and fast...all is working well ...preformance score 7.9.... would buy again... windows boot= 10 seconds or less
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: This SSD Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is SSD is faster than fast!!! I don't think how I ewill ever go back to a mechanical hard drive. I use the Vertex III as my boot drive and a 2 Terabyte Caviar hard drive to store my data. The computer boots fromn power button push to finish in 42 seconds. Photoshop loads completely in under 3 seconds, and I can perform a Radial Blur in under a second - that used to take as much as 5 minutes. Yes, it was expensive and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: William Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SSD
customer_reviews.text: Great price and performance, easy to install. Perhaps the only downside is the capacity and that you should have a 6 gbps interface otherwise you wont get your full bang for your buck, but if you are doing the transition from a hdd to a ssd this drive will blow your mind.
customer_reviews.author: Rafa

customer_reviews.title: it rocks so far
customer_reviews.text: Arrived pretty quickly. simple, efficient packaging. speed is good, TransRate= 134.70 MB/s, when copying a steam folder to a raid0 wd sataII. what is about the max I can get from such a system. Reading speed is between 170~220 mb/s, not bad. Writing speed is at 72.70 MB/s, some what dissappointing, but this is the speed when i am booting off from it. nice so far, like it. I just ordered another one to make a raid0.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: An improvement you can feel
customer_reviews.text: Most computer upgrades are merely based on technical numbers benchmarking softwares throw up and not something you can feel from a user's perspective and even major upgrades would be felt only in very demanding circumstances.. although SSDs cost roughly 4x more per gigabyte than a regular hard disk, the difference can be felt. from boot times to load times, everything that requires your hard disk drive would see a discernible improvement in speed.
customer_reviews.author: 7erence

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a very fast and reliable ssd. I bought this when I was building my PC, and so far I gave no issues with it. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent, performance acceptable, price magnificent. Valuable reasons to consider buying
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Villar

customer_reviews.title: Great ssd
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good SSD. It works extremely well and we are very happy with the purchase, its been in use over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: WadeWilson

customer_reviews.title: Works with Macbook Pro (early 2011)
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 500GB HD in my macbook pro (early 2011) with this bad boy. Boot up time is now 20 seconds or less and apps start up instantly. This is a most have if you have a laptop. I also removed my optical drive and replaced it with my 500GB HD so I have more storage. I usedto replace my optical drive.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: GREAATT!! product
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast and awesome hard drive. No noise is a real plus. The price isn't half bad either. Ohh and did I mention that it is super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ramo66

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an Early 2011 Macbook Pro 13'' inch, base model. I wanted to boost the speed a little bit, and was in doubt between adding more memory or going to the SSD. SSD was the perfect choice. It boots faster, comes out of sleep faster, any program I launch is instantaneous. Plus, there is a big battery improvement. I can't tell exactly how much, but I'd guess around 30% more battery life span. I couldn't be more happier about an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Nascimento

customer_reviews.title: Vertex SSD 120GB is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I just upgrade my macbook (late 2007) with the SSD Vertex 120GB and works perfectly. Can say more than 2 times faster than the the old HDD. Excellent performance and compatibility Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This has the best ACTUAL read write data you can find. Put it in my sons Steam Box. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyBuilt4CubanLinx

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: This went from a 5 star review to a 2 star review. Lifespan and quality is extremely questionable with these drives. I have 12 in very light production use and 4 have already failed in less than 6 months. That's terrible quality. I have one in my machine at home and it's fine. Go figure. I won't trust OCZ with my data any more. The Intel drives are more expensive and perform slower on paper, but I'll go with them for reliability.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hesse

customer_reviews.title: I feel the need for speed
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my primary drive in my MacBook Pro and the result is very fast boot, load and operations. It's not just faster, it flys.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Lightning fast
customer_reviews.text: This drive is large enough that I do not have to micromanage where every program is installed, and lightning fast at launching everything I have tried so far. General system responsiveness is much improved. If you are buying a top of the line CPU it is wasted without an SSD these days.
customer_reviews.author: SKTX

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Drive
customer_reviews.text: First thing i did was to flash the drive to the latest version.. Then comes windows and all other softwares... Great drive and speed.
customer_reviews.author: burnerx

customer_reviews.title: Good SSD
customer_reviews.text: At the time it was good and still is. I payed 1 for 1gig which is double what it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fast, but would have liked it to last longer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as my first SSD and it was incredibly fast compared to my old HDD. Unfortunately, after 2 years and 4 months the drive has failed, received a blue screen and it is now no longer recognized in the BIOS.
customer_reviews.author: William Wilson

customer_reviews.title: OCZ 120 GB Sata III
customer_reviews.text: Once I was able to enlarge the screw holes of the 3 1/2" bracket to enable its use with my Thermaltake Element S case, it was smooth sailing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Zugerman

customer_reviews.title: SSD for Photoshop
customer_reviews.text: Added this SSD for scratch space for image processing in Photoshop CS5. Really fast and combined with the 160 GB C drive, processing is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Super fast drives
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my Asus p8z68 mobo using intel raid 0. Running the AS SSD benchmark I was getting 986mb/sec read speeds.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I Installed this disk in my Macbook Pro when Mountain Lion was still in Beta versions, and It worked perfect. No problem with drivers or anything, it just works. Now I've been using it for almost two months and I'm still amazed at how fast this disk is.
customer_reviews.author: eromanc

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This drive is great. Very easy installation, no issues. I did a fresh install of Win 7 Professional 64-bit. I can't believe how fast it is. Pros: Extremely fast! Get one... Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I have heard people complaining about comparability issues etc with this drive. I installed it in a 2009 MacBook pro and it runs flawlessly at SATA II speeds because my mono doesn't support SATA III. My comp boots in 12 seconds now! The only thing I am not super pleased with is the battery usage... According to the specs, this thing uses twice as much power as the vertex 2.
customer_reviews.author: RedLightning

customer_reviews.title: Speed Demon of SSDs!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What can I say? Using this as a boot drive and for my games, etc... I can see the huge performance, in terms of starting up, copying files, downloading files quicker, etc, difference between this SSD, and mechanical drives. The speeds advertised are right on the money, for me anyways. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: S.Power

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome drive at an awesome deal. Put in my Macbook Pro and works like a champ. I have had no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to SSD asap
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever did was to upgrade to an SSD - highly recommend it to anyone still running a mechanical HDD. Can't compare it to comparable SSDs, I'm sure any SSD would seem super-fast relative to a mechanical drive.
customer_reviews.author: Rishav Bhat

customer_reviews.title: Quick SSD
customer_reviews.text: I ran two of these in raid 0 in a MBP w/disk drive caddy. Excellent drives, very quick. Was my first venture in to SSD's, very pleased with increase in speed and silent operation.
customer_reviews.author: MNestor

customer_reviews.title: Best SSD drive for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these in my laptop for over a year now. I did have to update the firmware when I first got it, I haven't had any issues whatsoever (win7 64bits). I bought a second one for my HTPC last week. The Drive was already on the latest firmware and the windows 7 install took a fraction of the time it did with a regular HDD. My laptop/HTPC boot in under 10sec and apps load a lot faster than before. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: DenverZAK

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered by amazon much sooner than the expected delivery date. Using it on my laptop with windows 7 and another VM on the same drive, amazing speed, absolutely no lag.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Fast and safe but nowadays there are better options in the market.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and safe but nowadays there are better options in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo L.

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD drive! Great performance factor!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this without incident for over three months now. When I first installed it as my main drive, I got some blue screen memory dump incidents but I got it stabilized after I completed installing some of the motherboard's drivers. I am very pleased with it and I do see some notable performance enhancements that make it worth having.
customer_reviews.author: C-LOS

customer_reviews.title: As awesome as you think it'll be...
customer_reviews.text: I put one of these in my Macbook Pro (Early 2011), and it's amazingly fast. The computer boots very quickly (and quietly), and applications open instantly. Remember, if you are installing one in your new Macbook Pro (Early 2011), only the current harddrive SATA port is 6GB/s. The optical drive's port is 3GB/s. I was replacing the optical drive with the Vertex 3, so I had to replace the current drive with the Vertex 3, and move the current drive to the optical drive bay (I used an OWC media bay kit). Great performance Average cost Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best upgrade ever for a laptop. I installed this on a 2011 MPB 13" and everything just got a whole lot faster. Boots up under 10 seconds, shuts down under 5, total silent, and performance of apps are amazing. Yeah it's definitely costly compared to other SSDs but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: fantastic super fast storage
customer_reviews.text: the day it arrived I installed it on my laptop, windows 7 installed in 12 minutes almost with my i3 processor. laptop boots fast and softwares load quick. no heat no conventional HDD sounds nothing, super silent, my laptop fan hardly works .
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: 3 years and still going strong after maaany reformats and the extensive caching from Adobe CC projects
customer_reviews.author: fliptheswitch27

customer_reviews.title: A Must For MacBook Pros
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to format. I'm getting great boot-up speeds (20-30 seconds) with a couple of apps launching at startup. This is a must-have for any MacBook Pro user!
customer_reviews.author: dendog

customer_reviews.title: wicked fast, dead simple
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it in, installed an OS and some apps and my machine felt wicked fast. Hoping it will hold up well over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Graessley

customer_reviews.title: Blazing Fast
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2011 MacBook Pro i7 17". Didn't worry about enabling TRIM support. I go from power off to desktop in 13 seconds, and that includes typing a password. A little pricy..but wow...the 5400 rpm that Apple included was a pig. I'm getting 8-12 hrs of movie/surfing on a charge with this setup.
customer_reviews.author: Richx

customer_reviews.title: ISR the SSD & Win 7
customer_reviews.text: Intel Smart Response and a 120 GB SSD drive & you get 4X faster for your frequent apps. You need to set up raid & then load your system but it is well worth it. The OCZ Vertex 3 120GB is the perfect drive to do the job & is a star of many reviews I am running a i7 on a new Gigabyte Z68AP-D3 motherboard with a Nvidia 560 TI graphics for Photoshop & Office work ISR can not use more than 120GB & the price of these drives is well worth using ISR. I'll advise more once I have used the setup for a while. Ed
customer_reviews.author: Edwardo

customer_reviews.title: Very fast drive
customer_reviews.text: comes in a very small packing like an envelop, also comes with a 3.5" tray to connect to regular 3.5" bays. very speedy as promised and reliable even after constant 1.5 years of usage.
customer_reviews.author: H.P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Drive
customer_reviews.text: I read many negative reviews on this drive but it seems to work fine. It is so much faster to boot with a SSD. If you are planning on migrating from a HDD to SSD, I recommend doing your homework. The process is long but worth it. I don't see why some suggest to do a fresh install when Windows 7 can do a backup and restore. Just make sure the aligment is correct, if it isn't, the performance of this drive will be hampered. It's a good drive at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: BenderUnit

customer_reviews.title: Still going...
customer_reviews.text: No problems so far. Running 4 of these in home currently, media center, laptop, and 2 in raid on my desktop. No issues whatsoever that I wouldn't have expected. 1GB/s read, and 400MB/s write in spanned raid. That has degraded a bit while I've filled them, but still MUCH better than contemporary spun media.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Minimum 3 BSOD's per day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale on Amazon when OCZ had a $20 mail in rebate deal, worst mistake ever. Despite upgrading the firmware religiously (now on v2.11 at the time of this review), I still get 3+ BSOD's per day and lots of glitches and freezing all over the place. Great SSD when it works, but problem is you have no idea how long that'll last. I don't use my computer for maybe more than 3-4 hours per day and yet, I still get a minimum of 3 BSOD's per session. Absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: mrMAXipad

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Bad Customer Service - Rebate
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this new drive. It's super fast and is great for boot up. I was surprised that the 120g filled up very quickly. I was even more surprised when my rebate was denied. I sent in two letters with complete documentation and missed out on 30 bucks. After emailing the company and receiving no response at all. I finally decided to give up on this company. After having such a satisfying product the company has left a sour taste in my mouth. I will be looking at a different company for SD drives next time. Advice to others would be buy the drive when the price is low without the rebate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schatzschneider

customer_reviews.title: Blazing fast and cool compatibility
customer_reviews.text: This is the fastest SSD i have ever owned. I was one of the silent majority and got one that worked right out of the box. No software updates or bios problems.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyAckley

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this hard drive!, Great performance, super fast booting, very good value. There are slightly faster hard drives, but the additional performance hardly justifies the price gap.
customer_reviews.author: Nayy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on July 1st and built a new system. Started having problems about a week in or so, various BSOD, etc. I got fed up with it and changed to my old 7200rpm drive 3 days ago and haven't had a single issue since. Problem is, I'm now outside Amazon's 30 day return window (by only a few days) so I have to figure out how I'm going to return this dud. It was my first OCZ product and at this rate, might be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Vathian

customer_reviews.title: Blazing fast!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome so far!!! I cloned my old HDD over to this and it's working wonderfully. This SSD is awesome, super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: amazing speed!
customer_reviews.text: suppppper!!!just love with it super fast speed,will let all my friend knows.so good thing to use for upgrade your laptop or desktop.
customer_reviews.author: huang

customer_reviews.title: like a big player
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with you load times this drive gives me in online play. If you are looking for some impressive data read times . . . get it NOW!
customer_reviews.author: __SAREK__

customer_reviews.title: FAST
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded for MacBook Pro 15-inch early 2011. Took out the 500GB HD that came with it. All I can say is AWESOME SSD! I wanted the 240GB but it's still too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: LoveIt

product_meta.title: OCZ 120GB Vertex 3 SATA 6Gb/s 2.5-Inch Performance Solid State Drive (SSD) with Max 550MB/s Read and  Max 4KB Write 85K IOPS- VTX3-25SAT3-120G
product_meta.description:
Size:120 GB| Style:9mmAs the third generation of the legendary VertexSeries,OCZ Vertex3 Solid-state Drives are designed and built to unleash the full potential of the 6Gbps SATA3 interface. The OCZVertex3 pushes the limits in both sequential and random data transfer rates, significantly improving your gaming, multimedia, and overall computing experience over traditional mechanical hard drives. In addition to maximized productivity, a Vertex3 upgrade makes a hard drive- equipped notebook more portable than ever with superior durability and reduced power consumption. Using the latest breakthrough controller and flash technology, Vertex3 SSDs work in perfect harmony with next generation platforms and operating systems to deliver the industry's best storage solution.

AMAZON.COM




Unleashing the performance potential of the SATA 6 Gbps interface, OCX leads the speed revolution with the next-generation Vertex 3 Series solid state drive. As the first SSD to feature the latest Sandforce controller design, OCZ created the Vertex 3 to push the limits in both sequential and random read/write rates to blaze past the competition when every MB/s matters. 

With incredible random 4k file writes up to 60,000 IOPS, this SSD takes productivity, gaming, and multimedia applications to the next level to work in perfect symmetry with the latest enthusiast platforms. This model of the 2.5-inch Vertex 3 (VTX3-25SAT3-120G) offers 120 GB of storage capacity and a 500 MB/s maximum write speed.

Built with the quality, reliability, and durability that lives up to the OCZ name, the Vertex 3 Series easily integrates into today's mobile and desktop platforms, and it features TRIM support to optimize performance over the drive's lifespan as the ultimate Windows 7 companion. It's backed by a 3-year limited warranty.



The OCZ Vertex 3 2.5-inch SSD with included adapter (view larger).

SUPERIOR PC EXPERIENCE
In addition to maximum performance, a Vertex 3 upgrade promotes cooler, quieter, and more energy efficient conditions compared to traditional mechanical hard drives. With no moving parts, SSDs provide peace of mind with their superior durability and reliability. Read more about SSDs below.







MORE SPECIFICATIONS
RELIABILITY/PROTECTION
 * Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF): 2 million hours 
 * Data Path Protection: ECC corrects up to 55 random bits per 512 byte sector (BCH) 
 * Product Health Monitoring: Self-Monitoring, Analysis and Reporting Technology (SMART) Support 

COMPATIBILITY
 * Serial ATA (SATA): Fully compliant with Serial ATA International Organization (Serial ATA Revision 3.0) and ATA/ATAPI-8 Standard Native Command Queuing (NCQ) 
 * Operating System: Windows XP 32-bit / 64-bit; Windows Vista 32-bit / 64-bit; Windows 7 32-bit / 64-bit; Linux; Mac OS X 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
 * Native TRIM support (requires OS support) 
 * Shock resistant up to 1500G 
 * Low power consumption (3W active, 1.65W idle) 
 * Included 3.5-inch desktop adapter bracket 
 * Service & Support: 3-year warranty, toll-free tech support, 24 hour forum support 

THE SSD ADVANTAGE
Whether you're refreshing an older laptop or trying to maximize the potential of the latest platform, SSDs provide substantial benefits over traditional hard drives.



GREATER DURABILITY
Solid State Drives feature a non-mechanical design of NAND flash mounted to circuit boards, shock resistant up to 1500g. Hard disk drives consist of various moving parts making them susceptible to shock and damage.

FASTER PERFORMANCE
SSDs have 100 times greater throughput and instantaneous access times for quicker boot-ups, faster file transfers, and overall snappier performance than hard drives. HDDs can only access the data faster the closer it is from the read/ write heads, while all parts of the SSD can be accessed at once.

LESS POWER CONSUMPTION, SILENT OPERATION, AND LIGHTWEIGHT
SSDs use significantly less wattage at peak load than hard disk drives--less than 2W versus 6W for an HDD--delivering longer battery life in notebooks, less power strain on system, and a cooler computing environment. With no moving parts, SSDs run virtually silent in your notebook or PC case to eliminate distracting noises during gaming or entertainment. And SSDs won't weigh down your laptop, netbook, or tablet PC when you're on the go.




FROM THE MANUFACTURER



OCZ Vertex 3 Solid State Drives unleash the performance potential of the SATA 6Gbps interface, leading the speed revolution in this next-generation solution. As the first SSD to feature the latest Sandforce controller design, OCZ designed the Vertex 3 to push the limits in both sequential and random read/write rates to blaze past the competition when every MB/s matters. With incredible 4k file writes up to 85,000 IOPS, these latest drives take productivity, gaming, and multimedia applications to the next level to work in perfect symmetry with the latest enthusiast platforms.



Take productivity, gaming, and multimedia applications to the next level

Built with the quality, reliability, and durability that lives up to the OCZ name, the Vertex 3 Series easily integrates into today's mobile and desktop platforms and features TRIM support to optimize performance over the drive's lifespan as the ultimate Windows 7 companion. Vertex 3 SSDs are available in 120GB, 240GB, and 480GB capacities and come backed by a 3-Year Warranty.

RELIABLE, FAST STORAGE
The Vertex 3 makes an SSD the ideal storage alternative to hard drives and delivers the quality, reliability, and durability demanded by consumers that will not settle for anything but the best. Built with SATA 6Gb/s and backwards-compatible with SATA 3Gb/s, the Vertex 3 Series easily integrates into today's mobile and desktop platforms and features TRIM support to optimize performance over the drive's lifespan as an ideal Windows 7 notebook or desktop upgrade.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND TOUGH
Shock resistance of up to 1500G ensures your data stays protected, in a drive that weighs only 77 grams. Get fast, durable performance in a drive that won't weigh down your laptop or notebook.

LOW POWER CONSUMPTION
For all their power, the Vertex 3 series of drives consume very little. Vertex 3 drives only consume 3 watts during operation, and only a watt and a half in standby.

3.5" DESKTOP ADAPTER INCLUDED
A 3.5" adapter for desktop drive cages is included, so you can use the Vertex 3 in laptops or desktops. The drives are RAID compatible, so you can slot them into a desktop RAID configuration as easily as into a laptop.

AVAILABLE IN A WIDE RANGE OF SIZES
OCZ Vertex 3 SSDs are available in 120GB to 480GB and come backed by a 3-year warranty and 2 million hour MTBF for ultimate peace of mind.

WHAT THE CRITICS ARE SAYING ABOUT THE OCZ VERTEX 3


"No single drive in our roundup matches the Vertex 3 on all fronts...OCZ continues its tradition of blazing-fast random-write performance, both at low- and high-queue depths, serving up more than 85,000 IOPS in our Iometer QD32 4KB random-write test."
--Nathan Edwards, MaximumPC

"OCZ don't make bad SSDs and the Vertex 3 is the latest in a long line of exceptional products from the San Jose based manufacturer. Priced at a competitive level the Vertex 3 is the fastest SATA based SSD that we have tested to date."
--Stuart Davidson, Hardware Heaven

"If you were expecting this drive to be one of the fastest 2.5-inch solid state drives available then you would be right...Overall ThinkComputers gives the OCZ Vertex 3 240GB Solid State Drive a 10 out of 10 score and our Editor's Choice Award!"
--Think Computers
